#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
long read_int() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  long ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}
main()
{
     int t;scanf("%d",&t);
     while(t--)
     {
       int n=read_int();
       int x=0,y=0;
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
       {
          int a=read_int(),b=read_int();
          x+=a;
          y+=b;
       }
       cout<<x-y<<endl;
     }     
}
